attributes.action: To have a plan of a second lockdown for the whole of the uk,
attributes.additional_details: We need to plan for a second lockdown to help break the virus up or at least slow this down we know the economy will be hit hard but all lifes matter not money - money can be printed life’s can’t be replaced
attributes.background: We need to plan for a second lockdown

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550736

Additionally, since you started your petition the Government has announced new national restrictions: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/prime-minister-announces-new-national-restrictions

The UK Government and House of Commons are only responsible for lockdown restrictions on England. Restrictions in other nations are a matter for the relevant devolved administration.
